Affinity.DESCRIPTION: A card attribute appearing above the card's title. | [A-W] refers to any #yAffinity.

After Image.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] whenever you play a card.

Afterlife.DESCRIPTION: Cards in #yAfterlife may be played by #yPurging any number of different cards from your hand or #yExhaust pile that collectively have all of its [A-Gen]. This does not use [E].

Augment.DESCRIPTION: #yAugments modify the effect or properties of the card they are slotted into.

Autoplay.DESCRIPTION: Automatically played when in hand. Still uses [E].

Blasted.DESCRIPTION: Take #b1 additional damage from #yAttacks, increased by #b1 per #b5 stacks. At the start of turn, lose HP equal to half of [Blasted] and reduce [Blasted] by #b1.

Blinded.DESCRIPTION: Reduces #yAttack damage by #b3, or by #b4 if at least #b1 [~Dark] is #yChanneled. At the end of turn, reduce [Blinded] by #b1.

Buffer.DESCRIPTION: Negate the next HP loss you receive, then reduce stacks by #b1.

Chance.DESCRIPTION: Activate an effect with a certain probability.

Chaos.DESCRIPTION: #yOrb. Effects vary depending on the current character and on the #yAffinities of the last card played.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever this card is played, reduce #yCooldown by #b1. At #b0 #yCooldown, activate this effect and reset #yCooldown.

Counter-Attack.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you block damage this turn, deal damage to ALL enemies and reduce stacks by #b1. Affected by damage modifiers.

Create.DESCRIPTION: Add a new card in the specified pile.

Curl Up.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] when you receive unblocked attack damage, then remove this power.

Current Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Cards with the [A-Gen] of the #yCurrent #yAffinity will #yMatch when played.

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.

Delayed Block.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] at the start of next turn.

Delayed Damage.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of your turn. Only enemies can die from this damage.

Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Strength] at the start of each turn.

Deva Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain additional [E] each turn. Increases by #b1 each turn.

Draw Minus.DESCRIPTION: Draw fewer cards at the start of next turn.

Draw Plus.DESCRIPTION: Draw additional cards at the start of next turn.

Energized.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of next turn.

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply [Poison].

Ephemeral.DESCRIPTION: Purges at the end of turn or when played.

Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal #b1 damage back.

Fleeting.DESCRIPTION: When used, remove this card from play and your deck.

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Lose #b1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at #b0 stacks.

Fragile.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts if you play another card while this is in hand.

Fusion.DESCRIPTION: Combine #yOrbs to create a new #yOrb dependent on the #yOrbs chosen.

Grave.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.

Impaired.DESCRIPTION: Reduces the effectiveness of your Orbs.

Innovation.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the costs of the next #yInteractable Power used.

Interactable.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn (unless specified otherwise), activate this effect by clicking this power's icon and paying its cost.

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal damage to a random enemy.

Level.DESCRIPTION: The #yLevel of an #yAura or #yElemental #yDebuff increases its effect.

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.

Loyal.DESCRIPTION: If this would enter your discard pile, move it to your draw pile instead.

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving damage, gain #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of turn.

Match.DESCRIPTION: A card #yMatches if it has the #yLast #yAffinity.

Match Combo.DESCRIPTION: The number of consecutive #yMatches made. [A-Gen] Cards do not affect your #yMatch #yCombo.

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the start of your turn.

Mismatch.DESCRIPTION: A card #yMismatches if it does not have the #yLast #yAffinity, and if neither #yAffinity is [A-Gen].

Multicolor.DESCRIPTION: Cards with #yMulticolor always #yMatch. When the #yCurrent #yAffinity is #yMulticolor, all cards with [A-Gen] will #yMatch.

Noxious Fumes.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply [Poison] to ALL enemies.

Orb Slot.DESCRIPTION: #yOrb #ySlots allow you to channel additional Orbs.

Pay.DESCRIPTION: Lose the specified entity to activate an effect.

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving damage.

Priority.DESCRIPTION: Priority determines whether a #ySummon will act before or after your turn.

Provoked.DESCRIPTION: The target receives #b50% more damage and must attack.

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Regeneration.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP at the end of the turn. Reduce by 1 each turn.

Resistance.DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming #yAttack damage and the effects of [Frail], [Weak], [Vulnerable], and [Impaired].

Reshuffle.DESCRIPTION: Reshuffling moves cards to your draw pile.

Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: If you would die, set your HP to this power's stacks and remove this power.

Scout.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards, then move the same number of cards to the top of your draw pile.

Select.DESCRIPTION: Perform an action on a card of your choice.

Self-Immolation.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card with [Block], ALL characters take [DD] equal to its [Block] times this power's stacks.

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.

Silenced.DESCRIPTION: Negate incoming buffs. Does not affect powers specific to cards or monsters.

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, take #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.

Sorcery.DESCRIPTION: The next Orb or Summon created has additional Focus or HP, respectively.

Soulbound.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck.

Special Augment.DESCRIPTION: #ySpecial #yAugments cannot be obtained from combat rewards, nor can they be removed from cards.

Spread.DESCRIPTION: Spread a target's power to ALL other enemies.

Stabilize.DESCRIPTION: Prevent a turn-based power from being reduced at the start of turn.

Starter.DESCRIPTION: Activates if played at the start of turn.

Startup.DESCRIPTION: Play this effect at the start of combat.

Summon.DESCRIPTION: #ySummon cards are placed onto the field and act every turn. If you would lose HP, your right-most #ySummon takes half of that loss.

Supercharged.DESCRIPTION: Gain additional [E] at the start of each turn.

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP lasts until end of combat.

Thousand Cuts.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies whenever you play a card.

Toxicology.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply [Poison], [Blasted], or [Shackles], apply additional stacks.

Trigger.DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effect of an #yOrb or #ySummon.

Vigor.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack played deals additional damage per hit.

Vitality.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [Temporary HP].

Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: #yWithdrawing a #ySummon #yTriggers it once and returns it to your discard pile.

~Branch Upgrade.DESCRIPTION: This card has multiple upgrade paths. When upgraded outside of rest sites, the first path will always be chosen.

~Brutal.DESCRIPTION: Affected twice by powers that modify damage.

~Delayed.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your deck.

~DelayedInfinite.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your deck. Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, place this card at the bottom.

~Elemental.DESCRIPTION: Ignores [Thorns]. Deal #b30% additional damage if the enemy has #yBlock.

~Ethereal.DESCRIPTION: #yExhausted if in hand at the end of turn.

~Fetch.DESCRIPTION: Move a card to your hand.

~Glyph.DESCRIPTION: The highest Glyph level at which victory was achieved.

~Innate.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in hand.

~InnateInfinite.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in hand. Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, place this card on the top.

~Lock-On.DESCRIPTION: Receive #b+50% damage from #yOrbs. Prioritized by #ySummons with random targeting.

~Magic Damage.DESCRIPTION: Affected by #yPowers modifying #yOrb output. Ignores #yPowers that modify #yAttack damage or activate on contact.

~Multiform.DESCRIPTION: You may change this card's form in the pop-up viewer from your master deck outside of combat.

~Recast.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, play a copy of this card. The copy #yPurges and does not #yRecast.

~Retain.DESCRIPTION: Retained cards are not discarded at the end of turn.

~RetainInfinite.DESCRIPTION: Remains in hand at the end of turn. | #yThis #yeffect #yis #ypermanent.

~RetainOnce.DESCRIPTION: Remains in hand at the end of turn. | #bOnce #bactivated, #bremove #bthis #beffect.

~Steal.DESCRIPTION: You can steal up to #b50 #yGold from a boss, #b25 #yGold from an elite, or #b10 #yGold from other non-minion enemies.

~Trophy1.DESCRIPTION: The highest Ascension level at which Act 3 was cleared with this series.

~Trophy2.DESCRIPTION: The highest Ascension level at which Act 4 was cleared with this series.

~Trophy3.DESCRIPTION: The highest Ascension level at which Act 5 was cleared with this series.

~Ultra Rare.DESCRIPTION: Has a very small chance of appearing in #ySeries card rewards. No more than 1 copy can be obtained.

~Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be #yUpgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck. Additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.

~Unknown Affinity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of battle, this #yAffinity becomes another random #yAffinity.
